n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.append(a[0])
a.append(a[1])

max_rest = 0
rest = 0
for i in range(1, n+2):
    if a[i] == 1:
        rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0

print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_rest = 0
cur_rest = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        cur_rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, cur_rest)
        cur_rest = 0

max_rest = max(max_rest, cur_rest)

print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

max_rest = 0
rest = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)
        rest = 0

max_rest = max(max_rest, rest)

print(max_rest)
